item.description:
We have a special reception Saturday night during SailFest so you can stop by and see the Vasiloff Glass Collection on exhibit at The TSETSE Gallery New London. We will have:

* Beer and Wine
* Refreshments
* Snacks
* Tables to sit at
* Live Music all night

Enjoy the second largest firework display in the country at SailFest. I'm told Mohegan Sun spends a million dollars for this 20 minute show. It is impressive. The most tame parts are stronger than most finale's. There is a reason 120,000 descend upon New London every year for this event. Enjoy it based in the serenity of The TSETSE Gallery.

Sincerely,

Mark G Roberts
Corporate Chairman
The TSETSE Gallery Inc.
Building Community Through Art
190 State Street, New London CT 06320
860-447-2447 www.TsetseGallery.org
item.name: SailFest Saturday Night: Party! Party! Party!
